We are excited to welcome Sociedad de Estiba Algeciras, C.P.E to LinkedIn! ğŸ‰ La Sociedad de Estiba del Puerto BahÃ­a de Algeciras is one of the members of our association and bring together all licensed stevedoring companies in Autoridad Portuaria BahÃ­a de Algeciras - Port of Algeciras. Their mission is to provide #specialized labour for #stevedoring tasks to their clients, ensuring #effectiveness, #efficiency, and #competitiveness. Check out their first post below and connect with them to stay updated on their latest insights and contributions. We look forward to seeing their continued success and engagement! ğŸš€ #Welcome #LinkedIn #NewConnection #Networking #Community

Celebrating #25Years of Maritime Excellence with COMPORT! Algeciras Port Community COMPORT, the Port Community Association of Algeciras Bay, celebrated its #25thanniversary during the annual assembly at CÃ¡mara de Comercio del Campo de Gibraltar. This milestone event brought together 160 member companies, showcasing the strong #community and cooperation that define COMPORT. Jose Tejedor, President of the association, emphasized the sense of belonging and collaboration that promotes Autoridad Portuaria BahÃ­a de Algeciras - Port of Algeciras internationally. Gerardo Landaluce, Chairman of the Port Authority, highlighted the achievements and #teamwork that have driven the port's success. The event also featured the "Association of Families of Alzheimer's Patients (AFA) of Algeciras," recognizing their 25 years of collaboration with the Port Authority. A video commemorating COMPORT's history was shown, and past presidents were honored for their contributions. The Port of Algeciras, now among the Top-4 European ports in cargo volume, owes its success to the dedication of the entire team. After the formal event, attendees enjoyed a day of camaraderie, reinforcing the community spirit that defines COMPORT. Here's to many more years of growth and success! ğŸ’ªğŸ‰ More details ğŸ‘‰ https://lnkd.in/dj_ijiiP

Now, let's talk about connectivity. Maintaining its remarkable performance, Algeciras ranks N.5ï¸âƒ£ in Europe for #MaritimeConnectivity in the latest Port Liner Shipping Connectivity Index (PLSCI) by UN Trade and Development (UNCTAD). With a significant score increase this quarter, Algeciras leads ahead of major ports in Europe ğŸ‡ªğŸ‡º, reinforcing its position as a competitive #hub in the Mediterranean. ğŸ“¢ Algeciras Port Community COMPORT at Posidonia 2024! ğŸŒŠâš“ We're thrilled to announce our participation in Posidonia Events 2024, one of the top maritime fairs, held in #Athens this week. Visit us at our stand (Hall 3-3202), where our robust delegation of 60 professionals from 30 companies will showcase the excellence in maritime services. Autoridad Portuaria BahÃ­a de Algeciras - Port of Algeciras is renowned for its variety, safety, quality, and competitive pricing, serving 120,000 vessels annually through the Strait of Gibraltar. Discover why we are a global leader in ship services, including agencies, repairs, provisioning, crew changes, maritime law, MARPOL services, supply, and bunkering. Join us and connect with: PÃ©rez y CÃ­a. Her leadership marks a new era for the organization. International Propeller Club - WISTA International ğŸŒ ğ‹ğšğ­ğ¢ğ§ ğ€ğ¦ğğ«ğ¢ğœğšğ§ ğƒğğ¥ğğ ğšğ­ğ¢ğ¨ğ§ ğ•ğ¢ğ¬ğ¢ğ­ğ¬ ğ€ğ¥ğ ğğœğ¢ğ«ğšğ¬ ğğ¨ğ«ğ­ On Friday, Algeciras Port hosted the Mission #PortLeaders, an initiative by Maritime Policy Bureau and PR PORTS LLC. The event aimed to strengthen ties between #LatinAmerican and Spanish port communities. This week we are in Mexico!ğŸ‡²ğŸ‡½ This mission, supported by CÃ¡mara de Comercio del Campo de Gibraltar, AndalucÃ­a TRADE, Autoridad Portuaria BahÃ­a de Algeciras - Port of Algeciras and Algeciras Port Community COMPORT, aims to enhance international promotion for local SMEs. The delegation attended a business day in #MexicoCity with Mexican logistics and customs associations. The mission continues with presentations on #AlgecirasPort services and B2B meetings, concluding with business visits in #Veracruz. #COMPORT participants include ecs360logistics, LOGISTIKA360 SL, Comercio Exterior Souto S.L., Operinter AndalucÃ­a, and ZENER MARINE ELEVATOR SERVICES SL. This activity is part of the PYME Global program by Spanish Chamber of Commerce, co-financed by the EU Regional Development Fund (FEDER). More info: https://lnkd.in/dQVDnVjn

ğŸš¢ Algeciras Port Leads Spain in Maritime Connectivity Growth for Q1 2024 ğŸš¢ According to the latest data from UNCTAD and MDSTransmodal, Autoridad Portuaria BahÃ­a de Algeciras - Port of Algeciras has achieved the highest increase in maritime connectivity in Spain for the first quarter of 2024. This achievement is thanks to our strategic position and the effective response to the challenges in the Red Sea crisis, bolstering our competitiveness in the Mediterranean region. #Algeciras now ranks 5th in Europe for connectivity, surpassing major ports like Piraeus, Bremerhaven, Le Havre or Barcelona. This growth also contributes significantly to #Spain maintaining its status as the European country with the highest #maritimeconnectivity, highlighting our crucial role in global maritime logistics. Read here: https://lnkd.in/dSnWcQvE
